ability.Storm Command: Boosts the power of Electric-type moves by 50% and its Electric-type moves have a 30% chance to paralyze the target if hit.
ability.Celestial Guard: Reduces damage from Dragon-type moves by 50% and heals 1/8 of its maximum HP when hit by a Dragon-type move.

Celestial Roar.effect: If the target is already paralyzed, the damage it deals increases by 50%

Ruler Strike.effect: Deals double damage if the target has higher HP than the user.

Guardian Shield.effect: Increases the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1 stage.
